CarePlan.name: CarePlan
CarePlan.description: Represents an instantiation of a care plan template for a particular individual in order to reach specific goals.

CarePlanTemplateId.description: The care plan template associated with the care plan.

CaseId.description: The case associated with the care plan.

CaseProceedingResultId.description: The outcome of a legal case for a participant.

ClaimId.description: The claim with which the care plan is associated.

Description.description: The description for the care plan record.

EndDate.description: The date until when the care plan is effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the care plan record.

ParticipantId.description: The account associated with the care plan.

StartDate.description: The date from when the care plan is effective.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the care plan.

TaskJobStatus.description: Specifies the status of the task in the task queue.

TaskJobStatusMessage.description: The message that describes the status of the task in the queue.
